title: Outsourced
description: Readers' Favorite GOLD MEDAL Winner 2017Chill With a Book Readers' Award Sept 2017What's the most dangerous gift a fan could send to an author?And if that fan was a professional assassin? New York-based writer Nic Stiles receives a strange package in the mail. It's not long before he realises what it represents will change his life... with deadly consequences. Others want the package's contents too, including a high-tech Intelligence agency who will stop at nothing to obtain it. ...and the sender wants it back! The new fast-paced SUSPENSE THRILLER from Eric J. Gates will make YOU question your Destiny!http://authl.it/B00NNNCA7M?d
author: Eric J. Gates
